messages.message: Hi team, i'm trying to add a Gmail connector in a deployment. it would be good if we gave some instructions on connecting the account like it does for outlook. See the two screenshots below
This is the link that's given by the outlook connector: https://docs.instabase.com/admin/data-sources/connect-mail#connecting-microsoft-outlook

Also as an FYI, gmail is not allowing work accounts to be connected via username / password or app password. Sign in with google is the default: / only supported way https://support.google.com/mail/answer/7126229?visit_id=638822503537516522-90059225&hl=en&rd=1

cc @jack.robbins
it seems that this used to work at least? https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C059K24M35E/p1744139277545339?thread_ts=1744059266.048769&cid=C059K24M35E
I am able to create an app password for *personal accounts*. It requires 2FA to be set up. cc @Kaustubh (KD)

For work accounts, given @Serena’s thread, these instructions (https://docs.instabase.com/admin/data-sources/connect-mail#connecting-gmail) only apply to personal accounts (with 2FA enabled). We should update the doc to turn on 2FA and handle business account cases, where I'm guessing most of our users are, with @Dave’s help
